5200.name: The Grand Gate Of Thalos
5200.description: You stand in the archway of a gigantic stone archway.  The two steel gates have been forced open and have rusted in place.  A hollow gust of wind blows by you into the deserted, and seemingly destroyed, city.

east.description: The desert sands stretch on for miles and miles.

west.description: You see devastation everywhere.  Houses lie in ruin and skeletons litter the streets.  You see strange beasts stalking the shadows.

5201.name: Main Street
5201.description: This was once a magnificent street, but now is in total ruin.  The streets are barren and windswept and the silence is unending.  To the south you see a ruined cottage while north leads into a dark back alley.  Howls and screams echo through the deserted city.

north.description: It seems to be a dark alley.

east.description: The entrance to the city lies this way.

south.description: A ruined shack lies to the south.

west.description: Main Street lies this way.

5202.name: Main Street
5202.description: This was once a magnificent street, but now is in total ruin.  The streets are barren and windswept and the silence is unending.  On one side is a collapsed house while on the other is the entrance to a large ruined mansion.  Eerie sounds echo within the mansion.  Near the center of  town you see a large domed building, relatively intact.

north.description: The remnants of a store lie this way.

south.description: It looks like what used to be the main building in the city.

west.description: A withered garden path lies this way.

5203.name: A Garden Path
5203.description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of the city.  Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare. Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves around your feet.  A sudden volley of howls pierces the air.

north.description: The garden path continues around the building.

east.description: This is the main street leading to the city's entrance.

south.description: The garden path continues around the building.

west.description: Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few holes in the ceiling.

5204.name: A Garden Path
5204.description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of the city.  Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare. Vines and ivy snake up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves around your feet.

north.description: A side street leads of to the northern half of the city.

east.description: The garden path continues around the building.

south.description: Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few holes in the ceiling.

west.description: The garden path continues around the building.

5205.name: A Garden Path
5205.description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center of the city.  Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare. Vines and ivy creep up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves  around your feet.

north.description: The garden path continues around the building.

east.description: Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few cracks in the ceiling.

south.description: The garden path continues around the building.

west.description: What looks like a market place lies this way.

5206.name: A Garden Path
5206.description: A circular path surrounds a magnificent domed temple in the center  of the city.  Flowers have withered away and the once lush trees are bare. Vines and ivy creep up the sides of the temple and entangle themselves  around your feet.

north.description: Inside the temple, small patches of light shoot through each doorway as well as a few cracks in the ceiling.

east.description: The garden path continues around the building.

south.description: A small side street leads to the southern half of the city.

west.description: The garden path continues around the building.

5207.name: The Market Place
5207.description: You stand in the middle of a large square lined on each side with baskets, carts, and stands of all shapes and sizes.  Abandoned, these little shops still contain some of their goods once sold to a demanding public.

north.description: A small table has been toppled over, spilling fine jewellery and gems onto the ground.

east.description: A small garden path encircles a large domed temple in the center of the  city.

south.description: Rotted remains of fruits and vegetables lie strewn about.

west.description: The market place continues.

5208.name: The Market Place
5208.description: You stand at the end of the market square.  Stands and carts line each side, filled with remnants of fine foods and exquisite goods.

north.description: Tattered carpets and ruined bales of silk sit idly by a run down stand.

east.description: The center of the market lies this way.

south.description: From the massive stench, this must have been a meat and poultry stand. It lies totally bare.

5209.name: A Side Street
5209.description: This small side street leads east and west into back alleys while to the south you see the temple.  The incessant howling tears at your mind.

5210.name: A Side Street
5210.description: You are in the common section of the city.  Ruined buildings made of clay and stone is all the view has to offer.  Most of these homes are  nothing but piles of rubble, but some look almost safe enough to venture into.    The street continues north and south and buildings line the street.

east.description: A small doorway leads into a partially collapsed house.

west.description: A small clay dwelling sits here.

5211.name: A Side Street
5211.description: This small side street leads away from the garden path to the south. Around you stand large piles or rubble where the houses of commoners used to be.  A lone howl makes you worry greatly about your safety here.

east.description: An unusually tall dwelling stands looming over you.

south.description: A garden path circles around the temple.

west.description: Here lies a small stone house with a thatched roof.

5212.name: A Side Street
5212.description: This small side street leads south away from the temple into the business section of town.  The destruction that leveled this city was not biased; these important looking buildings have been almost totally destroyed.  There is a hole in the wall of a very large structure to the east.

north.description: A small garden path encircles the temple.

east.description: This possibly could be the city hall.

west.description: Inside the building you see long pieces of metal, an oven, and some anvils.

5213.name: A Side Street
5213.description: This small side street is lined with the remains of once great buildings.  To the west is a dark, foreboding structure while to the east lies the entrance to a small tavern.  The street continues north and south.

east.description: From the looks of it, this was once a two story abode.  The entire second floor has collapsed leaving a very little part of the bar still free from debris.

west.description: This seems to be the only guild house in the entire city.  Its dark nature makes you wonder about its origins.

5214.name: A Side Street
5214.description: You are at the end of a long street leading to the center of the city. A long dark alley runs east and west.

5215.name: Under A Ruined Watchtower
5215.description: You stand at the base of a tall watchtower built to protect the city from invaders.  From the looks of things, it did not do a good job.

5216.name: A Back Alley
5216.description: This alley leads to the rear of what used to be a meat stand.  You wince at the stench.  South is one of the city watchtowers.

north.description: You see the back-side of the market place meat stand.

south.description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

5217.name: The Meat Stand
5217.description: A large stand has been set up here with metal hooks and wooden racks in the background.  Hanging on the hooks are very small scraps of meat and other game.  This stand is relatively empty, and a sudden burst of howling and screaming makes you realize why this is so.

north.description: The market place lies this way.

east.description: This is a cart full of rotted vegetables and fruits.

5218.name: A Back Alley
5218.description: A narrow alley leads east to a wider street and west to one of  the city watchtowers.

east.description: A small side street greets you.

west.description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

5219.name: The Guild House
5219.description: You are standing in what once was this city's ONLY guild house. Tables and chairs have been smashed and broken weapons lie strewn about the floor as if some massive battle had taken place here.  Draped along  the back wall is a tattered, jet-black banner with the symbol of the Darkside set upon it.

east.description: A small side street runs past the building.

5220.name: The Produce Stand
5220.description: A large cart sits here carrying rotted fruit and vegetables.  Flies  swarm all about what seems to be the last remaining bits of food left in the city.

west.description: A strong stench emanates from the meat stand next to you.

5221.name: The Smithy
5221.description: In here you find tools and anvils used to make various weapons and items.  The walls have been stripped clean and only a few incomplete pieces of armor and weaponry are left.

east.description: A small side street runs past the building.

5222.name: The Tapestry Stand
5222.description: Tattered and torn tapestries and rugs lie heaped in piles.  Fancy robes and various articles of clothing are now just rags.  You stare at  the strange piles for a long time until a piercing howl makes you think these might be beds.

east.description: A fine jewellery stand lies in ruin next to you.

5223.name: A Back Alley
5223.description: A narrow alley leads north to one of the city watchtowers while to the south there lies a market stand full of torn clothes and rugs.

north.description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

5224.name: Under The Watchtower
5224.description: You stand under one of the city watchtowers built to protect the city from invaders.  Obviously, it failed.

up.description: Above you looms a tall watchtower.

5225.name: The Jewellery Stand
5225.description: A table has been tipped over, spilling fine jewellery and gems across the market place.  Most of these trinkets are battered and  tarnished and few would have any value anymore.

west.description: Next to you is a stand full of ruined clothes and rugs.

5226.name: A Ruined Clay Dwelling
5226.description: This was once a very plain house with nothing more than a few chairs and a bed.  A cold fireplace suggests that the city has been abandoned for quite a while.  Almost nothing remains of this humble abode.

east.description: Outside is a small side street.

5227.name: A Collapsed Stone Dwelling
5227.description: This small house has completely collapsed upon itself leaving piles of debris here and there.  A few rafters still stand with thatched straw hanging down and a hot wind gusts through the hollow dwelling.

east.description: A small side street runs past the house.

5228.name: A Back Alley
5228.description: A narrow alley leads west to one of the city watchtowers and east to a small side street.

5229.name: An Abandoned Shop
5229.description: From the outside this place looks like an ordinary pile of rubble, but inside these cramped quarters you discover what used to be a shop filled with armor, weapons, and various other goods.  A small sign flutters in the wind.

west.description: A small side street runs past the shop.

5230.name: The Tavern Of The Sun
5230.description: A glorious place in its prime, this tavern now lies in ruin; tables and chairs are broken scattered, bottles and glasses shattered, and a small performance stage crushed.  Musical instruments and personal belongings lie under the rubble, but the people they once belonged to are  not with them.  Looking up you see that the entire second floor and roof  has fallen in, leaving a gaping hole above.

west.description: A small side street runs past the tavern.

5231.name: The South Wing Of The City Hall
5231.description: You stand in a large room attached to this end of the hallway which  leads back north to the reception area.  Pedestals and columns have fallen and most of the valuable items have been taken, leaving worthless debris. A few chairs have survived, as well as a large curved desk.  To the east is a vine-covered archway leading out into a private courtyard.

north.description: The long hallway leads back to the main reception area of the city hall.

5232.name: The City Hall
5232.description: This is the main reception area of Thalos' city hall.  The walls have been charred and scored massively and debris is spread from wall to wall. A large gaping hole in the west wall allows you to see out to one of the city's side streets.  Obviously no one will be seeing you through today.   Hallways lead south and east.

north.description: Main street runs past the city hall.

east.description: A hallway leads to the east wing of the city hall.

south.description: A hallway leads to the south wing of the city hall.

5234.name: The Private Gardens And Courtyard Of Thalos
5234.description: What a shame that this mass destruction also touched this once beautiful place.  The temple's garden path has nothing on this garden. Flowers and trees have been smashed into the ground and lawn benches thrown through walls.  A large marble fountain in the center of the courtyard still stands, though, defying any attempts to destroy its beauty.  Above stands the remnants of one of the watchtowers.  Archways  north and west lead back into the city hall.

5235.name: A Small Guard House
5235.description: This was once the barracks for Thalos' Cityguards.  Now just an empty shell, this small shack still stands guarding the entrance both to the city and to the city hall.

north.description: Main street runs by this building.

5236.name: A Collapsed Home
5236.description: All that's left of this house is a few scattered piles of rubble and a very large blast crater.  Obviously someone or something important  was once housed here.  A shrieking howl chills your blood.

south.description: Main street runs past this ruined home.

5237.name: A Tall Dwelling
5237.description: This seems to be the tallest structure remaining in the city.  At one time this could have been an inn of some sort, but now it is just a mess.  The back wall as been completely knocked down revealing an  entrance into another building through yet another collapsed wall. Between the two buildings are a few blast craters and boulders.  An old set of wooden steps leads up to a creaking second floor.

west.description: A small side street winds past the dwelling.

up.description: The stairs and even the entire second floor itself looks very unsafe for travel.  Gusts of wind make them creak and shudder.

5238.name: A Small Shack
5238.description: This cramped dwelling could not have housed more than one person.  Now with the back wall missing, it could hold many more.  Looking around you find broken shelves and workbenches with various vials and pouches spilling contents all across the floor.  This was possibly the magic shop of the city.  The doorway to the east is blocked, making the only exit back west.

5239.name: A Back Alley
5239.description: A narrow back alley goes south to main street and north towards a watchtower.  A mass of howls catches you of guard.

5240.name: A Back Alley
5240.description: A narrow back alley leads north to one of the city watchtowers and south towards main street.  To the west is a doorway to a small house blocked by debris.

north.description: A tall watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

5241.name: Under A Watchtower
5241.description: You stand under a tall watchtower.  Narrow back alleys lead west and south and a very weak looking ladder leads up into the tower.  Above you, you hear the screams of tens of starving lamias!  Beware!

up.description: Winds howl high above your head in the tower above.  You hear the screams of tens of howling lamias above you!

5242.name: A Bath House
5242.description: This was once the bath house for the commoners of the city.  Hot steamy water still wells up from a hole in the floor.  Obviously there is a hot spring located under the city (making the decision to put a city here seem much more reasonable).  Closer inspection of the water yields a dead body floating around in it, skin melted away from months of floating in there.  The west wall has collapsed revealing another collapsed house.

west.description: The wall has collapsed on the adjoining house, creating a new opening in it.

5243.name: A Back Alley
5243.description: A narrow back alley leads west to a small side street and east to one  of the city watchtowers.  Great amounts of steam issue forth from the building to the south.

east.description: A watchtower stands a silent vigil over the city.

west.description: A side street runs by here.

5244.name: An Upright House
5244.description: This home is practically the only one around that is still standing. Except for the massive hole in the east wall, everything else looks intact, including the windows.  Great amounts of steam issue forth from the hole in the east wall.

west.description: A small side street runs past the house.

5245.name: On The Second Floor
5245.description: The minute you step off onto this floor you realize it was a mistake. The old rotted floorboards suddenly give way and you fall down, impaling yourself on jagged boards below.

5246.name: The North-West Watchtower
5246.description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers.  The view is magnificent from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains.  No wonder this place stood for so long.

5247.name: The South-West Watchtower
5247.description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers.  The view is magnificent from here and you can see all the way to the western mountains.  To the south the desert stretches to the horizon.  No wonder this place stood for so long.

5248.name: The North-East Watchtower
5248.description: You stand atop one of the city watchtowers.  The view is magnificent from here and you the desert sand stretches to the horizon.  No wonder this place stood for so long.  The ladder leading down seems rotted in some places!

down.description: The city lies below... far, far below.

5249.name: Under A Watchtower
5249.description: As you descend the ladder, the rotted rungs break, sending you quickly to your demise far below on the city street.  Splat.

5250.name: The Temple Of Thalos
5250.description: You stand within one of the most holy places in the realm.  This stunning domed temple once housed the city's worshipers en masse.   Unfortunately, it succumbed to the destruction brought on this city. Long benches lie toppled and the altar desecrated.  Large chunks of stone have fallen from the walls and roof, sending sunlight streaming in on you.  A few books lie about, conveying to you a holy message in a strange tongue.        Wind gusts through the four archways and howls and screams can be heard from all parts of the city.

north.description: A side street leads to the northern half of the city.

east.description: Main street leads out to the main gate of the city.

south.description: A side street leads to the southern part of the city.

west.description: The market place lies this way.

5200.name: beholder
5200.long_desc: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
5200.description:
It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten
eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you
to disintegrate you.  Beholders are not known for their personality.

5201.name: lamia
5201.long_desc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
5201.description:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

5202.name: mimic
5202.long_desc: A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
5202.description:
A strong, wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy padlock on the
front.

5203.name: mimic
5203.long_desc: Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.
5203.description:
This large boulder seems to have been dropped here at some point, since
there aren't any boulders native to this area.  The two skeletons beneath
it are simply that, bones... no rags or anything else appears to be
attached to them.

5204.name: mimic
5204.long_desc: The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.
5204.description:
What a mess, you wonder to yourself what could have caused this rampant
destruction.

5205.name: mimic
5205.long_desc: Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.
5205.description:
The pottery shards appear to have been part of a large vase at one point,
probably before the city fell.

5206.name: mimic
5206.long_desc: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.
5206.description:
The fact that these planks still rest on this shelf leads you to believe
that someone has been here before you...

5208.name: golem
5208.long_desc: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
5208.description:
It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant stone
creature.  He stands here still guarding the city.

5209.name: lamia
5209.long_desc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
5209.description:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

5200.name: vest
5200.room_desc: A vest made of iron rings lies heaped on the floor.

5201.name: helm
5201.room_desc: An iron helm has been left on the ground.

5202.name: gauntlets
5202.room_desc: A pair of iron gauntlets rests heavily on the ground.

5203.name: sleeves
5203.room_desc: A set of iron sleeves lies on the ground.

5204.name: boots
5204.room_desc: A pair of iron boots has been left here.

5205.name: greaves
5205.room_desc: A set of iron greaves lie here unattended.

5206.name: girth
5206.room_desc: A small iron girth lies at your feet.

5207.name: plate
5207.room_desc: A battered iron breast plate lies here.

5208.name: shield
5208.room_desc: A small, but sturdy, iron shield has been left here.

5210.name: potion
5210.room_desc: A jet black potion sits upright waiting to be taken.

5211.name: potion
5211.room_desc: A small orange potion lies here.

5213.name: staff
5213.room_desc: A green serpentine staff has been left here.

5214.name: ball
5214.room_desc: A smooth quartz ball lies here gleaming.

5215.name: scroll
5215.room_desc: A worn and tattered scroll has been left here.

5216.name: scroll
5216.room_desc: A bound scroll of detection lies at your feet.

5217.name: flute
5217.room_desc: A brilliant silver flute glimmers from beneath a rock.

5218.name: talisman
5218.room_desc: A demon-faced talisman glares at you angrily.

5219.name: venison
5219.room_desc: A large chunk of venison sits here, ready to be eaten.

5221.name: sword
5221.room_desc: A nice two-handed sword hangs on a hook in the wall.

5222.name: robe
5222.room_desc: A black silk robe lies heaped in one corner.

5223.name: cloak
5223.room_desc: A beautiful dark green cloak has been dropped here by someone.

5224.name: seal
5224.room_desc: A small, engraved ebony seal is here.

5226.name: seal
5226.room_desc: A small, engraved ivory seal lies here.

5228.name: arm
5228.room_desc: A half-rotted arm floats lazily past your feet.

5230.name: stone
5230.room_desc: A pale blue stone sits here.

5231.name: stone
5231.room_desc: A pretty scarlet and blue stone has been dropped here.

5232.name: stone
5232.room_desc: A small incandescent blue stone lies here.

5233.name: stone
5233.room_desc: Someone has left a deep red stone here.

5234.name: stone
5234.room_desc: A tiny pink stone lies at your feet.

5235.name: stone
5235.room_desc: A lovely, pearly white stone has been carelessly left here.

5236.name: stone
5236.room_desc: A beautiful pale lavender stone lies here.

5237.name: stone
5237.room_desc: A stunning lavender and green stone rests on the ground.

5238.name: stone
5238.room_desc: A stone is here, sort of a dusty rose color and very pretty.

5239.name: stone
5239.room_desc: You can barely make out a dull grey stone on the ground.

5240.name: stone
5240.room_desc: A stunningly vibrant purple stone attracts your attention.

5241.name: stone
5241.room_desc: A bright pink and green stone has been left here.

5242.name: stone
5242.room_desc: A pale green stone lies here collecting dust.

5243.name: stone
5243.room_desc: An odd clear stone lies at your feet.

5244.name: stone
5244.room_desc: A large iridescent stone has been left here.

5250.name: mandolin
5250.room_desc: A mandolin lies against the wall.

5251.name: harp
5251.room_desc: A battered golden harp has been tipped over.
